onboarding_intro_title_1: Travel, Delivery, and Culinary in the Palm of Your Hand
onboarding_intro_description_1: Order an EV Moto for a ride, enjoy your favorite food, and send packages easily, all in one app!
onboarding_intro_title_2: Travel Pollution-Free, Drive More Environmentally Friendly
onboarding_intro_description_2: Eco-friendly travel with EV Moto. No smoke, no noise, just a comfortable, pollution-free ride!
